[[Tiddlersbar plugin|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023 MIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/license", "tags": "", "modified": "20221227164130631" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/readme": { "created": "20170325115014248", "text": "This plugin - based on Buggy j's [[StoryTopTabs plugin|http://bjtools.tiddlyspot.com/#StoryTopTabs]] - creates a 'Tiddlersbar' of open tiddlers (as tabs) on top of the screen. It works best in Zoomin view.
The Tiddlersbar can be toggled on/off (<>/<>) with a button in the Page toolbar and/or the View toolbar. <<< ''Note:''

<> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings", "tags": "$:/tags/plugin-tweaks", "order": "7", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221227170057932", "list-after": "$:/plugins/tg/layout", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Tiddlersbar" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings-help": { "text": "|Item |Description |Default |h |Toggle tiddlersbar in ~PageControls |'Toggle tiddlersbar' button in ~PageControls| | |Toggle tiddlersbar in ~ViewToolbar |'Toggle tiddlersbar' button in ~ViewToolbar| | |Left 'Tiddlersbar' |Start (from the left) of the Tiddlersbar| 42px | |Top 'Tiddlersbar' |Start (from the top) of the Tiddlersbar| 10px | |Font size 'Tiddlersbar' |Font size of Tiddlersbar | 0.9em | |Background color 'Tiddler tabs' |Background color of breadcrumbs | `<>` | |Text color 'Tiddler tabs' |Text color of tiddler tabs | `<>` | |Background color 'Tiddler tab selected' |Background color of selected tiddler tab| `<>` | |Text color 'Tiddler tab selected' |Text color of selected tiddler tab | `<>` | |Rounded corners 'tiddler tabs' |Rounded corners of tiddlersbar | 1px | ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings-help", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230170358959", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20170325115648290" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/style-no-tiddlersbar": { "text": "/* DEFAULT: HIDDEN TIDDLERSBAR */ .tgc-tiddlersbar { display: none; }", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/style-no-tiddlersbar", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191228200615839", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20170325115709994" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/styles": { "created": "20170325123352694", "text": "
/* TIDDLERSBAR TOP MENU */
.tgc-tiddlersbar {
     display: block;
     position: fixed;
     left: 0;
     top: {{!!top-tiddlersbar}};  /* vertical start of tiddlersbar 'menu' */
     width: calc(100% - 60px); /* right margin for '>>' icon */
     margin-left: {{!!left-tiddlersbar}};
     z-index: 900;
}

/* TIDDLERSBAR */
.tgc-tiddlersbar button {
     font-size: {{!!tiddlersbar-font-size}};
     color: {{!!tiddlersbar-text-color}};
     padding: 3px 5px 3px 5px;
     border: none;
     border-radius: {{!!tiddlersbar-border-radius}};
     background: none;
     background-color: {{!!tiddlersbar-color}};
     border-left: 1px solid #cccccc;
     border-top: 1px solid #cccccc;
     border-right: 1px solid #cccccc;
}

/* TIDDLERBAR SELECTED */
.tgc-tiddlersbar button.tgc-tiddlersbar-selected {
     color: {{!!tiddlersbar-selected-text-color}};
     background: none;
     background-color: {{!!tiddlersbar-selected-color}};
}
/* HOVER over 'x' */
.tgc-tiddlersbar button.tgc-x:hover {
     font-weight: bold;
}
.tgc-tiddlersbar button.tgc-tiddlersbar-selected.tgc-x:hover {
     font-weight: bold;
}
", "top-tiddlersbar": "10px", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/styles", "tiddlersbar-text-color": "<>", "tiddlersbar-selected-text-color": "<>", "tiddlersbar-selected-color": "<>", "tiddlersbar-font-size": "0.9em", "tiddlersbar-color": "<>", "tiddlersbar-border-radius": "1px", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221227184729438", "list-after": "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/style-no-tiddlersbar", "left-tiddlersbar": "42px", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/tiddlersbar": { "text": "
